about_the_game:
Supporter Pack – Show Your Love for Sugardew Island!

If you love Sugardew Island and want to support its development, the Supporter Pack is just what you need! By purchasing it, you’ll directly contribute to the game’s ongoing development and receive exclusive in-game rewards as a thank-you:

  • Lumberjack Outfit – A rugged look complete with a matching hat!

  • Wolpertinger T-Shirt & Trousers – Show off your love for mystical creatures with this adorable top and bottom set!

  • Strawberry Overall – A sweet, berry-themed outfit to brighten up your farm life!

And of course, you’ll also have the gratitude of the entire dev team for your amazing support! 💖

Please note: Getting this DLC is primarily a way to show your appreciation for the team behind Sugardew Island. The exclusive outfits are just a fun little bonus!
